statements: DELETE FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND academic_year = 2021;
DELETE FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE student_id = 101 AND academic_year = 2021;
DELETE FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE math_score > 90 AND reading_score < 80 OR science_score = 75;
DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_id = 101 AND teacher_id = 201;
DELETE FROM student_courses WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 2;
